unnormalised: Hey nature lovers! Hereâ€™s a quick scoop on wildlife conservation efforts in India. Remember that majestic tiger reserve in Bandipur? Well, they've just announced a collaborative project with the Wildlife Institute of India to monitor tiger populations using advanced camera trapping techniques across a 1000 sq km area.
normalised: Hey nature lovers! Here is a quick scoop on wildlife conservation efforts in India. Remember that majestic tiger reserve in Bandipur? Well, they have just announced a collaborative project with the Wildlife Institute of India to monitor tiger populations using advanced camera trapping techniques across a one thousand square kilometer area.

unnormalised: Think of it as a massive wildlife selfie campaign!
normalised: Think of it as a massive wildlife selfie campaign!

unnormalised: Also, the Forest Department of Kerala is gearing up for heightened vigilance during the upcoming Onam festivities. Why, you ask? Sadly, some poachers use the festive buzz as cover. They're deploying special task forces and increasing patrols to protect elephants and other vulnerable species. Officials are also working with local communities to spread awareness, reminding everyone that a truly blessed Onam means respecting all life, not just enjoying a delicious Sadhya.
normalised: Also, the Forest Department of Kerala is gearing up for heightened vigilance during the upcoming Onam festivities. Why, you ask? Sadly, some poachers use the festive buzz as cover. They are deploying special task forces and increasing patrols to protect elephants and other vulnerable species. Officials are also working with local communities to spread awareness, reminding everyone that a truly blessed Onam means respecting all life, not just enjoying a delicious Sadhya.

unnormalised: Speaking of delicious, let's hope our actions create a future where the only thing being hunted is the perfect biryani recipe, not our precious wildlife. Because every rustle in the jungle has a right to be there.
normalised: Speaking of delicious, let us hope our actions create a future where the only thing being hunted is the perfect biryani recipe, not our precious wildlife. Because every rustle in the jungle has a right to be there.
